entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with drizzle ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 then light after midnight. Low zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
